<< gcd special functions

primes

Prime numbers less than or equal to input value

Syntax

p = primes(n)

Input argument

n

scalar, real integer value

Output argument

p

vector with prime numbers.

Description

p = primes(n) returns a row vector containing all the prime numbers less than or equal to n.

The data type of p is the same as that of n.

Example

p = primes(15)

See also

factor.

History

Version Description
1.0.0 initial version

Author

Allan CORNET

<< gcd special functions
